radiographic_examinations.findings: Mesencephalic AVM with dilation of the vein of Galen.
Large mesencephalic AVM (Spetzlerâ€“Martin Grade 4) supplied mainly by two posterior cerebral artery feeding branches, draining into the vein of Galen.
Presence of a patent ductus venosus (PDV).

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Complete regression of the AVM confirmed by angiography in January 2006.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Complete regression of the AVM with a residual deep venous angioma characterized by a mesencephalic vein draining into the straight sinus and the vein of Galen.
